article:
Dear Nick,
A new term begins. My father _ a job in a bank. Our _ has to move to Green Street. It's a _ street with a lot of cars, buses and taxis here. I'm at Garden High School now. I'm _ here and I know only Miss White. We live in the same building and her house is next to ours. She teaches us Maths. She works hard and is friendly to my _ and me. So we like her.
Do you hope to visit our school? It's a _ place. There are three nice gardens in it. You will see all kinds of flowers in them. If you don't _ the way, please go down Fourth Street and turn right until  you see the bank _ your left. You will see a white building. Our school is just opposite  it. Please _ me when you get here. I will meet you. I hope to see you at my school.
Yours,
Simon
